import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AngularFirestore } from '@angular/fire/firestore'; import { AuthService } from '../core/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tracker', templateUrl: './tracker.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tracker.component.sass'] }) export class TrackerComponent { constructor(public auth: AuthService) { } }
